transArray.content: The hotel has good value for money, the bathroom space is reasonably designed, and it is close to foreign trade and economic cooperation. For breakfast, go to Qingfeng Baozi Shop next door, and for dinner, you can go to the surrounding areas for barbecue or stir-fry.

Dear guest, thank you for your recognition and affirmation of our work. "If you love cleanliness, stay at Hanting Hotel" is our slogan and work content that has remained unchanged for many years. Hanting University of International Business and Economics Beijing strictly abides by the cleanliness terms of Huazhu Group and is committed to creating a good hotel environment for guests. Hanting Hotel Beijing The University of International Business and Economics Hotel is located in Beijing's North Fourth Ring Road with very convenient transportation, close to the China-Japan Friendship Hospital, and has high cost performance. Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to leave a review for Huazhu Hanting Beijing University of International Business and Economics Hotel. I wish you all the best.
